name: Battery Farm
description:
Little game about a robot that grows a crop of batteries that power the nearby village.

Changes are on the way! This is an incomplete prototype under active development. It won't be an expansive experience, though one day a bigger game could be made based on it, but for now, this is a simple example for fun and practice.

🔰 It's also my first farming game, tile based game, and simulation game.

Feedback about controls and core gameplay would be most helpful.

▶️ View list of updates and plans on Trello.
